choices: Snack encounters a woman in peril <Reserved>
A group of slavers tracked her down!
0.content:
For those from eka's portal that have read and enjoy "Inside Adventurer" I'd like to present you with an alternate storyline for the story! We'll begin just at eh beginning of chapter 2, where Snack wakes up in the forest. As a note, if you want to progress in the story's main timeline, follow the reserved chapters to jump ahead a bit.

For those not familiar with the stories, here's a link!

https://aryion.com/g4/view/381834

Now then...an actual start to the chapter!


*Yawn* I feel great! I thought sleeping out on a tree branch would make me sore, but I feel better than ever. I try to stand up…before I realize that I’m not on the branch. Looking around, I’m floating a few hundred feet in the air.

When the hell did this happen?! I never made anything about faeries flying in the sky while they sleep. Wait, I did make something like that to a type of faerie…

“Status”

Snack
Race: Royal Faerie
Occupation: None
Elements: None
LV: 10
Exp: 1430
Exp to next LV: 70
HP: 800
MP: 13000
Atk: 4
Def: 90
MDf: 111
Agi: 16
Mag: 807
Int: 102
Luk: 2
Title: Creator, Monster Lover, Prey, Black Widow, Annihilator

…What the hell?! 4 titles and an evolution?! Why are the stats so high?! Even the high class equipment didn’t make me this strong before!

Also, what’s with these titles?! I get monster lover and prey. It comes from being pleasured by a monster and the other is from being eaten alive. But Black Widow? That’s supposed to be for people that kill someone that they pleasured…oh yeah. The snake counts…

Plus, Annihilator comes from dealing over twice the damage of a boss monster’s health in a single blow. That explains why the Rainbow Snake was different than normal, it was a boss class monster. Sky Piercer is way too strong…Let’s put a level restriction on it before players start logging in. Let’s say…whatever my level is when the world becomes public. What? I’m not a hypocrite! I need it to survive! If too many people have that kind of destructive power from the start, they might kill me!

That reminds me. What happens if I die? I have things set up so that when players die, they awaken at the last city they visited in a cathedral. Since I’m living in this reality now, dying could be the end of me if I encounter a glitch. Well, I doubt it but I’m not going to test it on purpose. After all, I’m just a petite little fae-

ROYAL FAERIE?! Did I seriously evolve into a Royal Faerie that quickly? I knew that the minimum level for evolution was level 10, but to go for the highest tier of evolution I needed to meet more requirements. Be over level 10? Check. Slay a rare boss class monster? Check. Hold an intensely high level of magic? Check. Have a rare title? Check.

Huh, I guess I did meet the requirements. But I gotta say, this makes me really happy. Royal Faeries are the rulers of the faerie kingdom and are regarded as the strongest sorcerers in the entire world. Lore says it takes centuries to become a Royal Faerie, but I did it in one day. In fact, a few hours. Although it was more of a coincidence than anything else. My mana is through the roof and my magic power is high enough that I could be considered an intermediate mage. Well, if I unequipped my items I’d only be at apprentice level.

But in lore, Royal Faeries float in their sleep because they are above everyone. I’m gonna miss the comfort of a warm bed…well, I guess I can tie myself down or stay under the covers to be stationary. Of course I could just stay in a belly. My unconscious levitation wouldn’t be strong enough to lift a predator…right?

Well, I’ll figure that out when I get to it. For now, I should focus on living. Since I made a ruckus in Mezra, I should probably make my way to the next village, Anon. I can see the path down below, but I’m still flying over the treetops. As much as I’d love to experience all the monsters on the way to Anon, I’m hungry. If a character doesn’t eat enough, they get a starvation buff which slowly drains health. Plus it doesn’t feel good to be starved. After eating a few berries the size of my head, I’m satisfied enough to continue.

Man, flying through the air feels amazing! After my evolution, I can fly around 50mph. Not as fast as my giant golem sprinting, but much faster than walking. And I’m barefoot, so walking would hurt my feet. I never saw the point of making high class footwear. Why would a boot make you tougher against a sword slash?! So, while shoes are offered in the game they only offer small buffs.

Due to this, many people walk around barefoot. Especially in the amazon country. The most you see from locals are basic cloth footwraps. I love the look of those~

What happens next?
0.title: Snack's Alt Adventure

choices: A ride to town...in her boot <Reserved>
For her to be her new owner
To form an adventuring party together
02.content:
Hell, even the woman being cornered by goblins is barefoot. Just the style I like too. Short leather skirt, leather tube top, barefoot. She had short purple hair, a few piercings around her face and light violet eyes. Light touches of dark make-up and black lipstick compliment her features. Her breasts were small, but still pretty nice. It looks like her knife is broken…

HOLY SHIT A HOT WOMAN IS IN DANGER!!!

Oops. Sorry. Got a little excited there. I shouldn’t be so surprised, random encounters like this are common. But GOD this one is hot. She’s got a real punk look to her. Like she’d be a total bitch to me. Like she’d try to make me a slave. Like I’d have to lick her feet and call her mistress.

I must save her.

Dropping down, I activate my new skill <Camouflage> to remain hidden. Her situation is worse than I thought. She has a large cut across her smooth stomach and is bleeding badly. Her broken knife is tossed to the side and is fighting the goblins with her bare hands. There were two dead already, but the other three had surrounded her and were trying to cut her.

All five of the goblins were males, so I have no problems killing them. How can I tell? Fool! The males wore simple loincloths while females wore a top piece to cover their small breasts. Why would I make any species male only? I wanted to make the entire world female only, but the stupid company said it would be discrimination…

Well, time to be a hero. I deactivate camouflage to save on MP and pull out Sky Piercer. I point at the human girl and cast <Heal>. Her wound began to slowly mend itself, but stopped short. I guess that’s the extent of a single heal spell. If I cast a few more, then she should be completely healed. But at least her life isn’t in danger anymore. But the goblins are.

I cast <Fire> on one of them. The hot blue flames killed him instantly. It didn’t even have time to scream. For the next one I tried <Ice>, which resulted in the monster being completely encased in ice. After a few seconds, it shattered. Lastly, <Thunder> seemed fun. From the clear sky a bolt of lightning struck the small monster. Its body was charred to a crisp.

<Skill “Fire” has leveled up to Lv2>
<Skill “Ice” has leveled up to Lv2>
<Skill “Thunder” has leveled up to Lv2>
<Snack has reached level 11>
<Snack has learned High Heal Lv1>

Wow. Maybe I should start using a weaker wand. It’s practically stupid how overkill I am to these beginner monsters. Well, at least the hotty is safe. Speaking of which, she hasn’t noticed me yet. It’s kinda cute the way she’s looking around like nature itself saved her. Well, let’s show her a hero!

“Um…you’re still hurt. May I heal you?” I ask. I lower myself a few inches from her nose so she can see me clearly. It takes her a few seconds, but her violet eyes fix on me. But she just stares silently. “Miss? May I heal you? I know I did it without asking the first time, but-“

“Are you…a faerie? Who do you belong to?” she asks, sounding bewildered. Her eyes had shifted, focusing on my slave brand. I suppose I do look odd. A slave branded faerie wearing only a sexy ribbon.

“I…don’t belong to anyone anymore…” Technically true. I want my character to appear to be an ex-slave that enjoys serving others despite having enormous power.

“I see. Well, if you’re offering then I’ll accept your help.” She’s not what I expected at all. Instead of being an overconfident bitch she’s actually a cool, calm person. Well, since I offered my assistance I might as well try out that new spell.

“<High Heal>” I say. Waving my wand, the adventurer became my test subject for my healing magic. She cringed as the wound sizzled and steamed as it closed. In seconds, the horrendous gash was gone without a trace. Her stomach is pretty toned…

“Thank you. The pain is completely gone.”
“Oh, it’s no trouble. If anything, I wish I could’ve helped before you were injured!”
“Now, what do you want?” Her face completely changed. She was looking at me like some kind of scam artist.
“N-nothing! If you’ll excuse me…” I say, floating back down the path.
“Not so fast.” Her hand snatches me out of the air and holds me in a tight grip. I weakly struggle in her grip, but it’s just for show. The pain of getting the air squeezed from my lungs always feels so nice~ Not to mention, there’s no way I could get out without killing this girl. My strength stat is so low that one of her hands could probably crush me to death…if I wasn’t equipped with high class armor. I told you, it’s armor.

“Um…miss? You’re hurting me…”
“Why did you save me? Surely you had a goal in mind. Money? Honor? Perhaps you wanted my body?”
“N-no! I just couldn’t stand back and watch someone get hurt!”
“…You have to be joking” she said flatly. Her cold eyes don’t change as she squeezes me tighter. It takes all my willpower not to cry out in pleasure.
“I’m…not…”
“Why would a runaway slave save a human? It makes no sense.” Oh, that’s right. My character should hate humans, since they were the main slavers of the world. The brand on my leg is also the sign of human property. By all means, my character should hate all of humanity.
“You…weren’t the one…who did…this…to me…” I wheeze out. My HP is still at max, but getting air in my lungs is still hard. She looks sternly at me for a few more moments before finally loosening her grip. She’s still gripping me firmly, likely believing I’d run away.
“You’re an odd one. While I am thankful, I refuse to allow myself to be in debt to someone. Tell me, what can I do for the equivalent of my life?”
“…Eh?”
“You heard me. I will not stay in your debt. I will provide you with anything you wish in exchange for your assistance.” Is she seriously giving me, a pervert, a blank check? I can ask for anything at all. Maybe I could ask her to eat me. I miss the warmth of flesh…but I just experienced it yesterday. Let’s go for something small.
“W-well…if you truly insist…maybe just a…small…kiss?” That’s good. Just a small reward from a maiden. But her face gets red and she tightens her grip again.
“A kiss? Is my life something that insignificant to you?! I told you to tell me an equivalent!” Shit. I offended her, big time. Well, she said she wanted something big.

What does Snack ask for?
02.title: Meeting Maria

1.content:
"Finally!" Amanda cried out. She had been waiting for over an hour for her new game to install. "Mythrios Unleashed" was a new bestseller that hit the market a week earlier. She was a little hesitant to get it due to the rumors of the creator being paralyzed while playing, but her friend Elizabeth talked her into it. She was a bit of an oddball, but she usually had good taste.

With that said, she needed to clear over 100 GB from her computer in order to fit the large game on it. It seemed excessive, but it was due to all the content that the game had. From what she found on the forums, it was just like real life. There were dozens of races, the NPCs had actual personalities, and hundreds of undiscovered skills.

A lot of the game was still unknown since it only recently came out. She read a news story that someone tried hacking into the system to try and pull out more information. His character was deleted while he was playing, and it took three days to safely pull his mind back together. That was one of the dangers of virtual reality. But she wasn't a hacker, so she didn't have anything to worry about.

After plugging in the virtual reality helmet, her vision faded to black. Soon after she was taken to the loading screen. After selecting a NEW GAME, she was moved to the character customization. There were over a dozen options for races!

After looking over the list, she chose...
1.title: Character Creation

11.content:
"I better keep it simple. If I'm not careful, it'll take me hours to create a character" she said. So Amanda selected the first option. Human.

Humans were the largest race in the game. They were all over the world and had many kingdoms. So many in fact, that there were multiple options on the type of human to make. Depending on the skin color, they would start out in a different country. It also had an effect on her stats, so she decided to make her job depend on her choice. Choosing the one closest to herself, Amanda was...
11.title: Human

111.content:
Once her ethnicity was selected, Amanda got to work designing her avatar. She started with giving herself a light tan skin tone. Sleek, black hair that fell halfway down her back. Dark brown eyes with flicks of gold in the iris. Then she worked the sliders to give her body a slightly pear shaped body. Modest breasts, slim waist, and big hips.

Then she added a few decorations. A tattoo of a black stripe from the center of her lower lip to the bottom of her chin. Small golden piercings on the edges of her eye brows. Blush and eyeliner makeup, not much, but enough to accentuate her face.

She confirmed her appearance and the screen faded to black. The next thing she saw was a blind fold being removed from her eyes. Amanda looked around swiftly. She was sitting in a wagon with several other woman. All were wearing thin harem outfits with their hands and feet in chains. Amanda included. The wagon was being pulled by some monsters that looked like bison, and six guards walked along the sides. Further out, there were large dunes of sand in all directions. The woman sitting next to her turned and spoke.

"Hey you're awake!"
"Yeah...what's going on?"
"You don't remember? I don't blame you. That guard hit you over the head pretty hard. I can't say how they got you, but we're being sold as slaves to some rich merchant."
"Keep it down!" a guard yelled. All the women lowered their heads and listened.

Amanda did as well, wondering who would make a start like this. But after a few minutes, the wagon stopped and guards began yelling. They were approaching the walls of an enormous city. Marble walls rose over 200 feet up, blocking the view of anything inside. Amanda guessed it would only take another ten minutes before they reached the gate. She took the chance to view her status.

Amanda
Race: Human
Occupation: None
Elements: None
LV: 1
Exp: 0
Exp to next LV: 20
HP: 100
MP: 60
Atk: 11

MDf: 2

Title: None

Then a different wave of shouting came from the side. Amanda turned to see a large group of people on horses racing towards the wagon, brandishing swords. The guards tried to defend, but were quickly over run by the numbers. The driver of the wagon took off, leaving the others behind.

But one of the attackers followed close behind and jumped onto the wagon. It was a woman wearing an egyptian style dress that showed a lot of skin. Pulling out a sword, she started slicing at the chains binding the other woman. Amanda was the last one to be freed before she killed the wagon driver with a single swing.

As it came to a stop, the woman jumped off the wagon and all others followed behind her. In the distance, a large group of guards were charging towards them.
"Quickly, everyone follow me! I can get you into the city safely!" her savior yelled.
"No!" a surviving guard yelled, running up. "Don't listen to this criminal! She will lead you to execution! Stay here with me, and serve your rightful owner! Loyalty shall not go unnoticed!" he argued.

The woman split into two groups, one going with the woman and the other going with the guard. Amanda, realizing she had to make a decision, turned and went to...
111.title: Entering Cairn

112.content:
Looking through all the various character options, Amanda starts creating her ideal character. First off, glossy black hair that tied back into a neat bun. Ominous red eyes that seemed to pierce the soul. A thin, pretty face. Next, she made sure that the body was on slim, but still femininely charming.

Next, she started the decorations. Her nails were painted to a blood red. She gave herself geisha style make-up that would look good if she wore a kimono. Obviously that wouldn't be the starting armor, but eventually her look will be complete.

With her character done, she accepted it and the screen faded to black. A few seconds later, a ruck sack was pulled from her head. Looking around, she saw that she was inside a prison cell! A woman wearing a guard uniform glared at her with hate in her eyes.
"Well, today is your last day as my prisoner. I hope you've had as much fun as I have. Once you're released, it's up to you to survive. If you find yourself back here...well, let's just say you won't be released again."

After that, the guard put the bag back over Amanda's head. Over the next few minutes, she's escorted out of the prison and thrown into an alleyway. Once she pulls the sack off her head, she's alone in the alley.

Amanda

Her stats were more focused on speed and magic than strength. The basic equipment was a prisoner outfit and a rusty katana. With that in mind, Amanda headed to...
112.title: Kantaya Providence

choices: Amanda decides to Accept Her offer.
Amanda declines the offer but Kisses the Beautiful Elf.
Amanda asked for other types of work.
1123.content:
Amanda happened upon a brothel,
Looking around the area, she saw many humans walking about yet she saw no gaming tables or any other forms of entertainment ... but what she did see were a lot of people drinking and laughing, she saw women and girls of every age, race and class.

Venturing deeper into the Den like establishment one of the human warriors who had obviously been drinking for quite some time, grabbed her in a tight embrace and began kissing her, Amanda pulled away with great difficulty and managed to get to the bar.
The human warrior gave chase, that was until the proprietor, a Beautiful Long haired fair skinned Elf had suddenly appeared out of nowhere with one arm wrapped around his throat armed with a very ornate double edged Blade and said " Okay now Bartemus you have had enough to drink tonight, its time to go home" as two huge Ogres grabbed his arms and escorted him out.

Amanda gasped at the courage and Beauty of the Fair skinned Elf .. " Thank you madam, I was taken back with fright until you appeared and saved me" as Amanda hugged the Beautiful Woman.
" Its quite alright my dear, its my pleasure saving such a beautiful young woman ... you wouldn't happen to be looking for a job would you ?"
1123.title: a brothel

choices: What type of clothing does Amanda choose ( description ).
Eve sends up one of her Girls to help you decide .
11231.content:
Amanda tells Eve " I am an Adventurer and would like to accept a more dangerous quest for you, yet I know that I only have rusty armor and weapons, surely I will need much stronger equiptment to fight off everything that I will come across to complete my quest" ...

"So, for that reason I will accept your offer and work here with you for some time, as to collect enough gold and silver to purchase the equiptment that I know that I will need " as Amanda thanks Eve for the opportunity to save and purchase all that is needed for her quest.

" It would certainly be my pleasure to have you join us for as long as you would like" as Eve wraps you in a long and heavy embrace.
" Ok then Amanda, go upstairs and the second door on the right, you will find many different choices of clothing ... please select what you would like to wear and then come back down here to me and we will get you working right away" .

Amanda then walks up the stairs when she hears Eve yell up to her " You will be making enough Gold and silver in record time Amanda " as Amanda just smiles down to Eve and enters the room and closes the door.
11231.title: Amanda decides to Accept Her offer.

11233.content:
The new player gasped and released the elf from the hug at the offer of work. This is a brothel...which means that she'd become a prostitute. She heard that it was possible for players to get that kind of work, but she just started! Then again, she did feel gratitude towards the NPC for saving her. That adventurer was clearly a high level, and it would have been impossible to fight him off on her own.

Looking back to the elf, Amanda couldn't help but marvel at the power of VR. This woman was an NPC, considering how Amanda couldn't get a status bar to open on her. But even still, she was simply gorgeous. Long, green hair, sparkling blue eyes, pale skin, and a face that would put most models to shame. Not to mention her curvy body, visible from her elegant robe with a slit over the chest, giving an eyeful of creamy cleavage.

"...I don't suppose you have...a different type of work I could do?" Amanda asked nervously. The lovely elf smiled sweetly and patted her shoulder.
"Not interested in being one of my girl's? Hm, that's a shame. you'd be a popular one. But I do have a few other tasks that you could help me with. Come" she beckons, moving towards the back. Amanda followed closely behind her, passing over eight armed guards.

Once threw the guarded back door, the atmosphere changes a bit. The decorations seem more luxurious, and the only people around are more guards. Just how well protected is this place? While thinking of that, the elf guides them into a room with a large desk, and enormous vault behind it. She sat down in a cushy chair before prompting Amanda to sit across from her.

"First off, let me introduce myself. I am Eva Redwood, and welcome to my brothel. Now, you say you're looking for work...but not as a courtesan?" she asked.
"N-no...thank you for the offer, but I'm trying to be an adventurer..." Amanda replied meekly.
"An adventurer?! In that case, there is certainly another task you can help me with..." she said, seeming more excited than before. "And do keep in mind, I pay much better than the guild does..."
"W-what do you want me to do?" she asked.
"No need to be nervous, sweetie. It's all perfectly legal. I want you to..."
11233.title: Amanda asked for other types of work.

112331.content:
"Really?" Amanda asked, surprised by the job. Why would the owner of a brothel need to have a monster slain? It sounded like something for the adventurers guild to handle.
"Yes. You see, there is a monster that has a certain gland which secretes pheromones. It makes a wonderful aphrodisiac when properly refined. I'd post the request to the adventurers guild, but they always keep a lot of the materials for themselves. So you job will be to kill it, and bring it back to me" she explained.
"That...makes sense. Yeah, sure!" Amanda agreed.

She was still in the early stages, so this must be a tutorial mission, right? That means the monster couldn't be too strong. The elven owner gave Amanda a lovely smile as she intertwined her fingers.
"Wonderful. I shall make the preparations, all you need to do is kill the beast. My employees will handle everything else. I shall have a carriage ready in the hour" she said happily.
"Sounds good...but what kind of monster is it?" Amanda asked. She wanted to make sure she knew what she was getting into first. Different monsters meant different preparations, after all.
"Oh, did I not mention? It's not a very strong monster. All I need you to kill is one, single..."
112331.title: slay a beast."

choices: Find those thugs again for work
115.content:
Once her ethnicity was selected, Amanda went to work designing it. First off, she adjusted the skin tone to be a creamy caramel color. She gave herself long, white hair that was tied back in a ponytail. Her eyes were set to a sparkling green. With the body proportion sliders, she gave herself moderate breasts, a slim waist, and a large butt.

Nodding to herself, she knew that she made her ideal avatar. There were a few options for decorations and markings, but she decided against it. It never looked natural to her for a character to be glammed out at the beginning. If she wanted to decorate, she'd do it once she was a higher level.

So she hit the accept button and faded away to darkness once again.

The first thing she noticed was a sack being removed from her head. Looking around, she was surrounded by a group of ruffians wearing leather armor. The leader, an asian looking woman, stepped forward with a smirk.
"Well, we got you into the city as agreed. But here's the thing...we're keeping all your belongings. You should be glad that we even let you live." She pauses for a moment, and you have the urge to ask several questions. It's likely that this is a point to ask for information.
"But wait, how am I going to survive with nothing?" she asked.
"Not my problem. But if you want some work that isn't strictly legal, come find me."

After she said that, a large man walked up from behind her and punched Amanda straight in the face! Everything went dark again as she passed out. She opened her eyes moments later to find the room empty.
"I guess this is the start..." she mumbled.

Amanda

She reviewed her stats and information. It seemed that her base stats favored strength and dexterity, but didn't have much magical power. The best course of action would be to become a rogue or warrior. Now...where to go to first?
115.title: Welcome to Impraza

1151.content:
Now that the opening sequence ended, Amanda felt like getting to the first quest. She could finally start the game for real! She walked out of the empty building to the street and looked it up and down. The city felt very medieval. The main roads were cobblestone, while the smaller streets are dirt.

The streets were packed full of people. Beggars sitting on the sides, asking for coins. Mercenaries walking boldly down the street. Shops and stands trying to get more business than everyone else.
"Wow, this game is so...detailed" Amanda muttered.

On the street corner, she spotted the adventurers guild. With a smile on her face, she ran over quickly. If she was going to get a quest quickly, that would be the place! Once she swung the door open, Amanda was amazed at interior. People of many fantasy races were inside, drinking, telling stories, and grabbing quests from a big board.

"Hey, noob!" someone shouted. Looking to her side, Amanda face eye to eye with an angry dark elf. "You're blocking the entrance" she said.
"S-sorry" she said, stepping out of the way. The woman scoffed and walked past her. It was a bit rude, but she was blocking the exit. So Amanda dropped it and walked to the receptionist. It was a slender cat girl wearing a uniform close to maid clothes.

"Welcome! How may I help you?"
"I'd like to register as an adventurer!"
"Excellent! I just need 50 gold coins as a registration fee and I’ll issue you a membership card."
"Oh...I was just robbed. I have no money." The receptionist's smile wavered for a moment, but she recovered.
"I see, that's awful. If you like, I can issue you a temporary license. It'll only be valid for one quest. Once you complete it, instead of the reward you can use it to pay for the fee. Plus an extra 20 gold coins for the temporary license. So you'll need to take a quest with a reward greater than 70 gold coins."
"I guess I have no choice..."
"Great! Here you are" she said. The cat girl handed Amanda a slip of paper with a lot of notes on it. It listed that she agreed to the terms.

Left with no other choice, Amanda proceeded to the quest board. Most of the beginner quests had little rewards, so she had to look at a few of the tougher quests.

The first was an orc subjugation. It entailed an adventurer going into the plains outside of town and killing ten orcs. The time limit was three days. Orcs started at level 15, so it would be tough to kill them within the allotted time. But the reward was 100 gold coins. An extra 200 gold coins would be rewarded to anyone that kills the field boss orc.

Another mission was a troll extermination. It was spotted in the area and was killing the lower level monsters. Trolls were boss class and was around level 30. It would be much harder to kill it, but only one needed to be killed. The reward was 250 gold coins.

Lastly seemed the safest. Reports were that an unknown monster had appeared near a lake in the forest. Someone needed to go out and discover the species and report it back to the guild. The reward was exactly 70 gold coins. It felt like a rookie trap, or it could be the standard rookie quest. However, it mentioned that dying meant the quest was an instant failure.

Which quest does she pick?
1151.title: Find the adventurer guild

11513.content:
Seeming to be the safest quest for a rookie, Amanda grabbed the paper off the board. Once off the board, the notice disappears into smoke.
<Investigate The Lake>
<Max Amount of Quests Accepted>
But a system notice appears with small instructions. Amanda smiled and rushed out of the guild, failing to hear several other players snicker at her.

Amanda passed through the city gate by showing her license to the guards. Outside of the gated walls were large plains that span miles. Following the road, Amanda walked for over an hour before she finally reached the forest. It seemed to span even further than the plains, so she used the mini map to guide her way.

It took another 45 minutes before Amanda could hear the sound of water. After walking through the last grove of trees, Amanda could see the lake. It had cool blue water that seemed more still than glass. It was about 200 feet in radius, with a cliff acting as a wall on the far side.
<Investigate The Lake>
<Investigate The Disturbance>

Upon her entry the objective changed. As if it realized her presence, the water began to bubble in the center. Amanda pulled out her weapon in preparation, but didn't realize the danger she was in. This quest was famous for being the "rookie killer." No player had ever survived the lake monster.

Then, slowly rising out of the water, was a...
11513.title: Hidden Danger

choices: Nothing yet, Amanda tries to reason with her
115132.content:
The monster's head started emerging slowly. Judging from the crown of its head, the monster was incredibly large. Sleek, purple hair was the first thing visible. As it rose higher, Amanda could see one large, closed eye. Suddenly, it burst upwards!

Water splashed all over Amanda and the surrounding area as it burst out of the lake. Amanda shielded herself by turning around. When the downpour stopped, she looked back at her quest target. Her jaw dropped as she stared at the monster in question.

Light purple hair that descended past the shoulders. Smooth pink skin was bare everywhere she looked. Breasts that were bigger than wagons. A trim belly with large hips that met the water just above the waist. A gorgeous face with a single blue eye had a happy smile.

It was a female cyclops! The water made it just below her belly button, but Amanda guessed she was at least 70ft tall. Honestly, rather than monstrous, this cyclops was beautiful.
"Haaaaah, I love baths!" she said to herself, stretching her giant arms. It seemed unaware of Amanda's presence.

She could have gotten away...but Amanda was too entranced by the bathing monster to move. When she took this quest, she never imagined this scenario happening. It must be some kind of fan service to the players. But as she thought this, a blue eye fell upon her.

"AH! PERVERT!" the cyclops squealed. Amanda was shaken out of her trance as an enormous pink hand reached for her. She turned to leave, but was quickly snatched off the ground. The new adventurer was brought before the cyclops's lovely face. Large tears were forming in the giant eye and her lower lip was pouting. It was actually quite the adorable sight.

"Y-you were watching me bathe!" she accused in a cute voice.
"I-I didn't mean to! It was an accident!"
"Liar! Why is it you adventurers always come to spy on me?!" she complained. Finally breaking, the giantess started wailing as a stream of tears poured onto Amanda.
"Agh! I'm sorry! Please don't cry!" she said, trying to calm the monster down.

The cyclops cried for a minute before she finally calmed down.
"Y-you're a pervert..." she said, clearly still upset. "There's only one way to deal with perverts..."

What does the Cyclops do to Amanda?
115132.title: Fan Service of DEATH!

12.content:
Elves. A fair skinned race known for their beauty, long lives, and pointy ears. They had high mana, dexterity, and attack power but were not much hp. Amanda decided to make the best elf anyone would ever see on the servers.

She started from top to bottom, first giving her long, grass green hair that fell down her back. A delicate face with a dainty nose and sky blue eyes. Her lips were given a coating of pink gloss. She originally thought to max out the breast size, but the slider went so far, they could become bigger than her body! It looked too comical, so she stopped it once they were a few sizes bigger than her head. A thin waist and trim stomach, followed by wide hips with a shapely rear.

For any other decorations, she added pink nail gloss to her hands and feet. Also, a small tattoo on her back that looked like a magical symbol. With that, she clicked accept. But instead of being sent to the game, she was taken to another screen.

Turns out, there were a few options for the elf starter, each with different lifestyles. The first one was a city elf. Elves that live in human cities, usually beggars and prostitutes due to human oppression. They weren't given equal rights, and lived hard lives. This start gives a boost to dexterity, but lowers magical talent.

The next one was the classic forest elf. Elves that live together with nature in thick forests. They acted as guardians of nature and fight off invaders. Although smaller villages have a high risk of being attacked and enslaved. This start gives a small boost to magical power, but no stats are lowered.

Next was a slave elf. Elves that lost their homes to invaders and taken away as slaves. They have a variety of uses, from pleasure slaves to battle slaves. Either way, they are treated like animals. This start gives a large boost to health, a small boost to attack power, but lowers all other stats.

Then there was the option of an exiled elf. Elves that committed crimes in their villages and were banished because of it. They can't return to the forest, and have to live their lives without a home. Many become criminals or mercenaries to survive. This start gives no boost, and no demerit.

Which to choose?
12.title: Elf

15.content:
Looking further down the list, there was also...

Dark Elves: Similar to elves, but with dark skin. They live in scattered groups among capitals, and most live as criminals.

Beast-Kin: Look similar to humans, but the have tails and ears, as well as other features, of animals. Mainly live in the wild, scattered across the world by species.

Half-Beast: More beast than man, these beings look more like bipedal animals with human features. They live in a closed off island nation, but many are found across the world.

Giant: Large beings that look human, but stand 40-100 ft tall! They live in tribal style villages to the north.
15.title: Other

155.content:
Ogre: Hulking monsters with rippling muscles. The strongest member of the tribe is the leader, and they consider magic cowardly. They are hideous starting out, but can become more attractive after evolution.

There was also a list of monster races in a separate section she could check.
155.title: Other

1552.content:
Following the path of the beast!

Goblin: One of the weakest species in the game, but also those with high potential. They start weak, but can evolve into specialized races or even into different races entirely! They have green skin, and are rather ugly starting out.

Orcs: Pig faced monsters known for their lust and gluttony. They have a habit of kidnapping women as either breeding materials, or meals. Their evolution path can either make them more human like, or beast like depending on the conditions.
1552.title: Monster Races

15521.content:
Amanda smiled as she chose to become a goblin. She always enjoyed a challenge, and what could be more challenging then becoming a mob? Goblins were known for being incredibly weak.

After selecting it, she was taken to the customization screen. All starter goblins have green skins, but it varies. Amanda selected a light green. She also selected short, orange hair. She tried to make her character look as cute as possible. By the end, she ended up with a goblin that looked like a child with green skin and small fang poking out of her mouth. She also chose to decorate her character by giving her three earrings on her right ear.

Pressing the start button, the screen faded to black.

Her eyes fluttered open. Looking around, she was in a forest and laying on the ground. Goblins start out alone in the wild. Looking down, Amanda noticed her body was completely replaced by her character. The graphics were astounding! It was like she was truly in a fantasy world as a goblin!

Looking at her status, she saw that she had the basic equipment. A loincloth that covered her sensitive regions and a wooden club. She had extremely weak stats all around, and no skills. The path of the goblin was filled with strife...

Amanda
Race: Goblin
Occupation: None
LV: 1
Exp: 0
Exp to next LV: 10
HP: 10
MP: 4
Atk: 1
Def: 1
MDf: 0
Agi: 1
Mag: 0
Int: 1
Luk: 3
Title: None

Now, what to do first?
15521.title: Goblin

155211.content:
The most important thing now was to go out and hunt. As a Lv 1 goblin, Amanda could be killed by most monsters. She didn't want to do anything until she was strong enough to hold her own. So she started walking aimlessly through the forest.

It was quite a beautiful forest for a video game. She could smell the fresh air, hear birds chirping around her, even feel the earth beneath her feet. It was all so realistic. If she didn't have options like a settings screen, she'd believe it was real life.

Suddenly, a red dot appeared on the mini map. Amanda ran to the nearby bushes and crouched low. The enemy wasn't moving from its spot, so Amanda held her club and started creeping towards it. This was her first prey of the game, and she wasn't going to let it get away!

After a minute of creeping around, Amanda saw it sitting around in a clearing. It was a...
155211.title: Huntress Goblin

155214.content:
"Oh, what have we here?" a feminine voice ran out. Amanda turned and looked to the source just as someone was coming out of the bushes. She held her club out, on her guard. But it was clear that it was useless.

Out of the bushes strode a female orc with pink skin. She was quite plump, with heavy breasts that sat atop a bulging potbelly. She wore a leather top that tightly gripped her breasts, but showed a lot of cleavage. The top was ridden up due to her large belly, showing off her bellybutton. Her only other garment was a pair of leather shorts that struggled to hold her meaty rear.

Her plump face was still that of a pig's except for neon pink hair that was styled in a mohawk. The way she licked the lips on her snout, it was clear she wasn't friendly.
"It looks like a newly born goblin...how lucky for me!" she exclaimed, strongly patting her flabby stomach. "I was just starting to feel peckish."

Amanda weighed her options against this monster. It was clearly stronger than her. After all, she did just start playing. If that thing caught her, she'd be nothing but a meal. There were three ways she could think of handling this.

One would be to attack first in hopes of catching her by surprise. Since she just started, there was a chance that this was a training event for beginners. Not to mention, it could increase her strength.

Next would be to find a way to trick or distract her. Then she could use this opportunity to run away. Doing this, she could escape and increase her dexterity.

Lastly, she could try to talk with this orc. Maybe her intelligence was low. If that was the case, she could convince it to be her friend instead of her predator.

As the orc stepped forward, she chose...
155214.title: Instant Lesson

choices: Taunt her and draw her somewhere else
Purposely get eaten, and attack from within!
1552141.content:
She just started playing this game, there was no way she'd lose her first encounter! Amanda gripped her club tightly in her hands and tensed every muscle in her body. If she got a good strike in, maybe she could win this!

<Amanda has learend Passive Skill: Warrior's Soul LV 1>

Nice! Refusing to back down set her down the path of a warrior, slightly increasing her attack power. That would certainly help. Before the fat pig could pull out a weapon, Amanda launched herself forward! She swung the wooden club as hard as she could, getting a square hit on the orc's head!

...

But the orc looked more confused than anything. An HP bar appeared above her head, and Amanda's heart sank as she saw there was barely any difference. Her attack didn't even deplete 1/20th of her health.
"Huh? Did you just attack me?" she said, stupefied. It seemed she couldn't believe such a weak goblin attacked her instead of running away. Amanda, however, quickly recovered and attacked again. She swung three more times, hitting her square in the gut. But each time, the club simply sunk in to the fat before bouncing back without leaving a mark. On the fourth swing, the orc grabbed the club with her bare hand.

"So, you want to fight? This is interesting..." she said, licking her lips. "I'll swallow you whole!" Amanda let go of her weapon and backed off. If she was going to beat this fat ass, she'd need to be smart. her attacks had little effect, and she imagined that only one or two of her attacks would mean death.

Now...how to fight?
1552141.title: Uphill Battle

choices: The orc lands a hit and wins!
Halfway through, the orc calls a timeout
Someone appears and instantly kills the orc
15521412.content:
She wasn't going to win this fight without a weapon, and she certainly wouldn't win by charging straight ahead. So Amanda started running to the side of the orc. The monster started moving to intercept her, but Amanda turned and juked to her side. While in close range, she punched her in the stomach. Once again, it bounced off without dealing much damage.

As the orc reached for her, Amanda jumped behind the orc. She noticed a dagger in its sheath wedged between her fat buttcheeks. Without time to think, Amanda grabbed the hilt and pulled it out.

<Amanda has equipped weapon: Crack Blade>

Such a dirty name! If she had any other weapons, Amanda would drop this dirty thing! But the monster turned and reached for her, forcing Amanda to jump back.
"Thief!" she cried out. Amanda just smiled and ran at her side again. The orc was too slow once again, and Amanda slashed at her side as she passed by.

<Amanda has learned Passive Skill: Weakpoint Detection LV1>

This time, a thin cut could be seen in the monster's fat.
"Oh? That hurt a bit..." she muttered, swinging a girthy arm at her. Amanda continued to dodge her attacks while inflicting her own. Over the next ten minutes, Amanda managed to shave off 1/4th of her health. But, she was beginning to get tired.

Could she keep this up?
15521412.title: Run around, attacking any opening

155214121.content:
Over the next half hour, the little goblin dodged and slashed at the hungry orc. During that time, Amanda kept getting stronger by repeating her attacks.

<Amanda has learned Passive Skill: Dagger Mastery LV 1>
<Amanda has learned Skill: Slash LV 1>
<Amanda has learned Skill: Dodge LV 1>
<Amanda has learned Passive Skill: Perseverance LV 1>

Those small boosts helped her get faster and stronger. Before she knew it, the orc only had a little health left.
"You...you pest!" it yelled, charging at her. Amanda dodged once again, but this time she jumped onto her back! She straddled her head with her legs and raised the dagger up high.
"Die!" she yelled, plunging the blade into the orc's eye. It let out a pained squeal before collapsing on the ground.

Amanda fell with it, but the orc's plump corspe cushioned the fall. After a few seconds, the corpse began to fade away.

<Amanda has reached level 2>
<Amanda has reached level 3>
<Amanda has reached level 4>
<Amanda has reached level 5>
<Amanda has reached level 6>
<Amanda has reached level 7>
<Amanda has reached level 8>
<Amanda has reached level 9>
<Amanda has reached level 10>
<Amanda has reached level 11>
<Amanda has reached level 12>
<Amanda has reached level 13>
<Amanda has reached level 14>
<Amanda has learned Skill: Heavy Strike LV 1>
<Amanda had learned Skill: Wide Slash LV 1>
<Skill "Slash" has leveled up to LV 2>
<Skill "Dodge" has leveled up to LV 2>
<Amanda has earned Title: Underdog>
<100 gold earned>
<Orc Hide earned>
<Orc Meat earned>

After receiving so many notifications, Amanda spent a minute sifting through it. It seems that the orc was quite a high level for her to earn so many levels at once. But she won. Her first fight in this game was...exciting!

She felt like celebrating! Then again, she still needed to be stronger. She was level 14 now, but chances are there were much stronger enemies in this forest. Also, she didn't even have a tutorial yet! Maybe if she wandered around, she could find a town and sell some of her loot.

What should she do?
155214121.title: She persists, and wins!

choices: An adventurer kills the orc, letting her escape
15521414.content:
After swinging her club into her fat multiple times, Amanda could tell that all attacks would be useless. The thick layer of flab all over the orc acted as a natural shield. Blunt damage was useless, and Amanda hadn't received any blades yet. Then a thought struck her.

If she couldn't cause damage on the outside...she could inflict some on the inside! The orc woman just said she would swallow her whole. If that was true, she could attack inside her stomach all she wanted and the orc couldn't attack back!

Amanda scanned the ground for a weapon and saw only sticks and rocks. She picked up a few of each and placed them into her inventory. With a few weapons secured, she put on a fake smile.
"Oh, you wanted to swallow me whole?"
"Yes! I'll feel you squirm inside me until you're dead."
"Why didn't you say so?! Go right ahead" she said cheerily. Amanda walked right up to the orc, completely defenseless.

Once she was close enough, she pig woman dropped the club and grabbed her with both hands.
"Willing? This will be fun..." she said. Her snout opened wide, revealing a slobbery maw lined with yellow teeth. Amanda's head was plunged into the smelly mouth as the monster began eating her.
'Ew, this is so gross!' Amanda thought.

The jaw and throat seemed to stretch as the monster swallowed the goblin girl. Her head was pushed down the throat as the orc pushed her deeper inside. With a quick swallow, the throat muscles alone pulled her down to her waist. Her small, green legs nearly fit inside the monster's snout. With another gulp, her entire body was pulled into the hot, wet confines of the monster.

<Amanda has earned Title: Foolish Strategist>

It only took a few seconds before she was dropped into the tight confines of the stomach. Amanda had enough room to sit up while inside. There was a puddle of fluid that submerged her legs and waist.
"This is so gross" Amanda whined. The orc's belly was hot, dark, smelly, sticky, and wet.

Wanting to get out as soon as possible, Amanda took out the stick from earlier and began hitting the stomach walls. She repeatedly attacked until the stick broke. Or more accurately, melted. That's when she began to notice a burning sensation from the parts of her body in the puddle of fluid. She was being digested!

She began to realize that allowing herself to be trapped in a high level monster's stomach wasn't a very good idea. Her HP was beginning to steadily decrease. In a matter of minutes, she would be nothing but nutrients to the orc woman.

But refusing to lose, Amanda equipped a rock with one hand and a stick in the other. She began frantically attacking the walls, hoping it would be enough finish off the orc before death.

<Amanda has learned Passive Skill: Perseverance Lv 1>
15521414.title: Terrible Idea

1552143.content:
Amanda lowered her wooden club to the ground and laid it bare. It would be useless against this monster anyway.
"Please wait a minute" Amanda calmly pleaded.
"Huh? What do you want?" the orc rudely responded.
"I wish to speak with you."
"Ha, those are some fancy words for a goblin."
"Are they? Anyways...is there any chance I could convince you not to eat me?"
"Huh? Why wouldn't I eat you?" she asked, stupefied. It was as if she had heard the most ridiculous thing in her life. It seemed this orc eating her was already a fact in her mind.

"Well...why do you want to eat me in the first place?"
"I'm hungry, and goblins taste good."
"Isn't there other things you can eat in this forest?"
"Yeah. Yummy stuff grows all over the place."
"Couldn't you eat that instead of me?"
"It's not as tasty as goblin."

Amanda grimaced. It seems that talking this pig monster out of it would be harder than she thought...
1552143.title: Negotiations

15521431.content:
"I guess you have a point...oh, for the record, I'm Amanda."
"Gilly" the orc snorts. It seems she was getting impatient...
"It's nice to meet you Gilly!"
"Yeah...and it'll be nice to eat you..."
"Wait a second!"
"What now?!"
"Are you really going to eat your friend?"
"Friend? What friend?"
"Well, me of course! See how we're talking like this? Would you talk with your food?"
"No..."
"And you know my name like I know your's. Does food have its own name?"
"No..."
"So if I'm not food, then I must be your friend, right?"

The gears in Gilly's head seem to have stopped working, and she simply nods. It seems that Amanda was successful in befriending this monster.
"Say, how about we go hunting together? As friends, we can catch something tasty and I can cook it for you!"
"Oh, sounds good!" Gilly responded, drooling out of her mouth.

<Gilly has joined the party!>
<Amanda has learned Passive Skill: Negotiation Lv 1>
<Amanda has learned Passive Skill: Charisma Lv 1>

Oh, a new skill and a party member! Amanda saw that her new skills gave her a boost to wisdom, and intelligence. Her MP was slightly raised thanks to that. Now that they were in the same party she decided to look at Gilly's status to see if she stood a chance against her in a fight.

Gilly
Race: High Orc
Occupation: Beserker
LV: 42
HP: 1161/1200
MP: 150/150
Atk: 120
Def: 96
MDf: 55
Agi: 40
Mag: 10
Int: 5

Ugh, this woman was clearly strong! But luckily her intelligence was super low. Some of her stats didn't pop though. Most likely since she was another person.

"So, what should we hunt? I'm hungry" Gilly complained.
"Well, if I remember what's around here..." Amanda trailed off. She tried to think of the local monsters in the area. With Gilly's help, she could quickly raise her level! But she had to be careful. There could be monsters even stronger than her in the forest.
"I say we should hunt some tasty..."
15521431.title: She succeeds

15523.content:
Kobolds: Monsters that look like dogs walking on two legs. They could be mistaken for Half-Beasts, but they look more monstrous. They start as mutts, but evolve to higher breeds.

Troll: Large monsters that stand around 10 ft tall. Renowned for their strength, these brutes can decimate entire parties of adventurers. But they also have low speed, intelligence, and can't use magic.

Ghost: Human in appearance, but unable to be seen by most. Starting out, they can only effect the mana of others and need to level up to inflict damage. Contrarily, they are immune to physical damage. Once they evolve, they can become more tangible and bring death.
15523.title: Other

155234.content:
Harpy: A female only species with the lower body and wings of bird, but the torso and face of a woman. Evolution in this species is limited to jobs and specialties.

Lizardmen: With the appearance of lizards that stand upright, there are many variations and tribes. They can evolve to look more human or more monster. The highest tier of evolution is just below the level of dragons.

Demon: A race that originate in hell, one of the hardest races to play. Human appearance except for odd colored skin, devil horns and tail. Blessed with high magic abilities, demon players fight against all other races (except certain monsters). Can evolve into higher positions in the hierarchy.
155234.title: Other

1552344.content:
Slime: The most basic of enemies. These beings start off as the weakest, but can level up through eating. Many evolution branches lead to different specialties, and can become a fearsome force after enough time.

Zombie: Human in appearance, these undead rise from the dead and stop rotting. Able to move severed body parts at will. At higher levels, they can regain the flesh they've lost and look almost human.

Skeleton: With no flesh, these monsters are just moving bones. Unable to speak until evolved to a higher species. The appearance cannot be changed.
1552344.title: Other

15523441.content:
After selecting the species of slime, Amanda was surprised that the screen faded away to black without her being able to customize herself.

When her sight returned, she was inside a large forest. Everything around her seemed extremely large, like she was looking up from the ground. Curious of what she looked like, she decided to check the 3rd person camera.

Then she saw her body. It was a small glob of blue slime. She realized why she wasn't able to customize herself. The different species of slimes can be identified by their appearance. The color variations are important, so she couldn't alter her appearance at the beginning. She decided to look at her status.

Amanda
Race: Training Slime
Occupation: None
Elements: None
LV: 1
Exp: 0
Exp to next LV: 10
HP: 10
MP: 10
Atk: 1
Def: 0
MDf: 0
Agi: 1
Mag: 1
Int: 1
Luk: 2
Title: None

So weak! But what was a training slime? Hopping on the internet quickly, she looked it up. It said that it was a beginner slime that was extremely weak, but is raised quickly.

She decided to test it out by moving over to a nearby plant. After rolling over it, her body sucked it in and broke it down.

<Amanda has leveled up to LV: 2>
<Amanda has learned Skill: Small Heal>
<Requirements to evolve have been met>

So easy! Looking over the game log, Amanda noticed she had just eaten a herb. It was a restorative item. Since slimes can gain experience just by eating, they can also learn skills by eating items. It seems Beginner slimes can learn at an accelerated rate this way.

She also decided to see what evolution condition she met. It seems that by gaining a level, she can evolve into a Slime. The standard type of slime. Also, for learning a healing skill, she can become a Lesser Healing Slime. One that specializes in healing.

Now, what should she do?
15523441.title: Starting Small

155234413.content:
Before she could decide on a course of action, Amanda heard the sound of clashing metal nearby. Curious, she moved through the bushes to remain undetected towards the noise. After a few minute of travelling, she was greeted by the sight of a battlefield.

There were a few corpses lying around, and two opposing sides were exchanging blows. On one side were three humans. They were all female and seemed to be an adventurer party. They had severe injuries and were probably losing. All three seemed to be warrior classes and didn't have a healer.

On the other side were five lizardmen. She couldn't tell the gender of them since they looked like walking alligators to her. They also seemed to be injured, but they were in a half circle trying to defend something. It looked like a nest with several eggs inside.

It seemed like either side could win at any moment. Amanda rushed through the possibilities in her mind on what to do. No matter what, this seemed like a golden opportunity for her. There was lots of stuff for her to eat that she could use to get stronger. She could simply wait until the fight ends and eat the bodies after.

Then again, she could also help the human women. They were probably on a mission to get those eggs. Since she just gained a healing skill, she could increase its level by healing them. That way, they would win and she could get stronger! Then again, Amanda was technically a monster. They could choose to kill her afterwards...

Another option was to help the lizardmen. They were monsters like herself, so it would make sense to heal them and push back the adventurers. Not to mention they were just trying to protect their offspring. In a certain light, the humans were the ones in the wrong.

But a devious thought came to mind. She could sneak around all of them and take the eggs for herself. What kind of powers could she gain by eating those?
155234413.title: Pick a side!

1552344133.content:
Deciding to stick to her character, Amanda chooses to help the lizardmen defend their eggs. Moving out of the shrubs, she rolls herself towards the scaly monsters. One of them notices her approach and hisses menacingly. To prove her intentions, she cast Small Heal on it.

The HP bar above its head raised a little. It must have understood her intentions, as it spread its legs to allow her to pass under. Rolling as fast as she could, she darted behind the wall of monsters. Once she was by the nest, she began casting Small Heal on the lizardmen. Each use took 1 MP, which is how much she regained each minute. So she would heal all the monsters, then spend a few minutes recharging.

<Amanda has reached level 3>
<Skill "Lesser Heal" has leveled up to LV 2>
<Skill "Lesser Heal" has leveled up to LV 3>
<Amanda has learned Passive Skill: Caring LV 1>

Thanks to the added healing, the monsters began turning the tide of the fight. The adventurers were slowly hacked to pieces in a rather gory scene. During that time, Amanda gained some experience for healing the lizardmen.

After the women were dead, the scaly creatures turned their attention to Amanda. Each one was covered with green scales and stood about six feet tall. They were quite large compared to the small slime girl. The leader of the group, one with a deep scar along its face, stepped forward. It placed a hand in front of her, signalling that it wanted to hold Amanda.

She hesitated for a moment, but rolled onto its scaly palm. The monster raised her to eye level and...
1552344133.title: Help the lizardmen

15523441331.content:
"Young slime, I thank you for your courage. Without your help, we surely would have suffered heavy losses" it says. The monster's voice was rugged and smoky, but was faintly feminine. Apparently it was a female.

Amanda tried to respond, but noticed she couldn't. Of course! Slimes don't have mouths, so there's no way she can communicate! The leader seems to notice her struggle and laughs.
"You haven't learned to communicate yet, huh? Very well. As a reward for healing my subordinates, I shall help you."

She dipped one of her claws into Amanda's body with her free hand. It hurt a bit, but a notification made her ignore it.

<Amanda has learned Skill: Telepathy LV 1>

"There, now try speaking with your mind."
"Like this?"
"Yeah, looks like you've got it. Now then, for your next reward."
"Next reward?"
"Of course. We are a grateful people that repay all debts. I still owe you for my life, as well as the safety of these eggs."

Amanda mentally smiled at the prospect of more rewards. It seems she made the right call, helping these monsters. However...what else could they give?

"What kind of reward?"
"Needless to say, you are welcome to eat the corpses of those pesky humans. Those are already yours, so I need to give you more. Well...at the top of my head, I can give you some food. It seems you're still a Beginner Slime. Our food is filled multiple animals which can give you strength. Also, we could take you back to our village. If you wish, I can show you our maidens. You can take one as a wife. But if none of that works for you, I can just give you gold. I'll let you think on it while you eat." She gingerly placed Amanda on the ground on top of one of the adventurers. She wasted no time devouring the deceased.

Amanda thinks about the possibilities. First off, she could refuse the other rewards and just eat the corpses. It should give her some strength, and she won't seem selfish to the lizardmen. If possible, they could make good allies. Then again, eating their food also sounded good. If it had a lot of ingredients, it could make her much more powerful!

Then there was the option of taking a wife. She heard that polygamy was a popular feature in this game, and it wasn't limited to just humans. People could have an entire harem of monsters. If she accepted, she could have a loyal follower!

Then there was the last option. Amanda didn't have much need for gold at the moment. Right now, she didn't have any pouches or storage magic. Beginner Slimes could only eat items, not keep them. But...what would be the reaction if she ate gold? Perhaps she could unlock a rare evolution path.

<Amanda has reached level 4>
<Amanda has reached level 5>
<Amanda has reached level 6>
<Amanda has reached level 7>
<Amanda has reached level 8>
...
<Amanda has reached level 23>
<Amanda has learned Skill: Ice LV 1>
<Amanda has learned Skill: Wind LV 1>
<Amanda has learned Skill: Fire LV 1>
<Amanda has learned Skill: Disarm LV 1>
<Amanda has learned Skill: Slash LV 1>
<Amanda has learned Skill: Dance LV 1>
<Amanda has learned Skill: Seduce LV 1>
<Amanda has learned Skill: Snipe Shot LV 1>
<Amanda has learned Passive Skill: Archery LV 1>
<Amanda has learned Passive Skill: Sword Mastery LV 1>
<Amanda has learned Passive Skill: Dagger Mastery LV 1>
<Amanda has learned Passive Skill: Staff Mastery LV 1>
<Amanda had learned Passive Skill: Mana Control LV 1>
<Amanda has learned Passive Skill: Charisma LV 1>
<Amanda has learned Passive Skill: Bargaining LV 1>
<Amanda has learned Passive Skill: Charm LV 1>
<Extra evolution conditions have been met, new paths have opened>

After clearing five adventurers and twelve lizardmen, Amanda had gotten quite a bit more powerful. She acquired a lot of skills and levels just from eating. It seemed being a Beginner Slime had its advantages. She decided to check the new evolution paths later, after deciding on a reward.
15523441331.title: Good Hearted Monsters

155234413313.content:
The chance at gaining a lizardman wife seemed too good to pass up. It would be quite a unique follower. Plus, she was a little interested in how this game handled romance. Were there monster sex scenes? She had to find out. Rolling back over to the chief, Amanda was held once again.

"I hope you enjoyed your meal. Have you given any thought to my offers?
"Yes, I was hoping...you could show me the your village maidens"
"So, you're interested in marrying one of my clan? That's good. It's important for our tribe to marry strong partners. You may not be there yet, but with your bravery I'm sure you'll become powerful." If slimes could blush, Amanda would at the sudden praise.

The chief left a guard at the nest and the rest escorted Amanda to their village. It took half an hour of walking through forest before they reached a large lake. Wooden huts surrounded it and many lizardmen could be seen moving around.

As the villagers spotted the chief's approach, a large crowd formed as they ran to check up on her. They were screaming questions about her injuries, the missing lizardmen, and Amanda's presence.
"Listen! Today, we fought hard against the vile humans! But we were only victorious thanks to this brave slime's help! As a reward, she will be taking one of our maidens as a bride! Have them bathed and brought to my home!" she dictated. The group of monsters broke up to follow her instructions. Meanwhile, the small slime was taken to the chief's hut.

It was the largest in the village. Two stories tall, it had it's own cooking pot and sleeping area. A good supply of dried food was upstairs. The chief sat on a pile of hay with Amanda on her lap, gently petting her.

After about an hour, the women were brought in one by own. The first one had dark green scales and stood taller than the chief. She seemed to be pretty strong and sturdy. It could be a pretty decent tank...
"This is the eldest daughter of our warrior family" the chief explained. The woman growled a bit in response and moved to the side.

The next one to walk in had grass green scales, and was rather thin. But her claws also seemed much sharper than the other's.
"This is our village trickster. She's a bit mischievous, but I'm sure she'll be a loyal wife." The lizardman winked at Amanda before moving to the side. She seemed nicer, and also more rogue like.

Finally, the last one to walk in an oddity. Instead of the usual green gator looking monsters, this woman had dark blue scales. Her body was rather thin, and she was missing her right eye.
"This is an orphan we picked up years ago. While she isn't a blood member of our tribe, we accept her as our own. She is also blessed with magic. Now, who do you choose?" the chief asked.

"Wait, aren't you forgetting someone?" asked the rogue lizardman. The chief glared at her.
"What do you mean?"
"As I recall, there's one more person who's never had a mate..."
"Oh?" the warrior chimed
"Chief, she's referring to you" explained the mage.
"W-what?" the chief stuttered, clearly not expecting that.
"What? You never married anyone before, and you offered that slime a maiden, right? Well you fir that description as much as us."

The lizard chief looked like she was about ready to gut the rogue when Amanda stopped her by choosing the...
155234413313.title: Accept a lizard bride

1552344133133.content:
As soon as Amanda saw the mage, she knew that she was the one to pick. Her blue scales made her seem...exotic. It could be that she was a unique monster. Not to mention that she knew how to use magic. Is raised right, she could become a powerful monster.

"I choose the mage" she said. The blue scaled woman stepped in front of her and the chief, bowing politely.
"I am honored, and shall serve you well" she said. The chief cleared her throat and stood up. She handed Amanda to her new wife, looking a bit dispointed. Maybe she really did wish to be picked?
"Very well then. By my power as Village Chief, I pronounce you two as mates!"

Amanda has received <Nameless> as her wife.


The lizardman smiled down at the small slime.
"It is official now. If I may be so bold, what is my spouse's name?"
"I'm Amanda."
"Well, Amanda, it's custom to name the spouse after the ceremony. May you give me a name?"
"Oh, of course! Hm...how about...Shala!"

After she said it, a small message appeared above her head. It listed name in orange letters. Standard monsters only had white letters. Orange letters signaled that she was a rare monster. Not quite unique, but close.

Shala
Race: Lizardman (Variant)
Occupation: Witch
LV: 6
Exp to next LV: 2130
HP: 280
MP: 400
Atk: 10
Def: 15
MDf: 33
Agi: 21
Mag: 62
Int: 89
Luk: 11
Title: Ice Witch of the Swamp

Oh, it seems that she truly was a rare one. Her stats were better than Amanda's in every way possible. It was a good thing that she was her wife...

"Now, as is tradition, you two must now leave the village for the next month!"
"Wait, what?!"
"Wife, were you unaware? Newlyweds must leave the village for one month and cannot during that period. It is a test to ensure that we can survive with each other. Protect one another" Shala explains.
"I see..."

The entire village escorted the pair out of the village and into the swamp once again. Shala held Amanda affectionately in her arms as she walked.
"Now then...what shall we do first?" she asks. Amanda thinks for a moment and decides to test her new wife by...
1552344133133.title: mage

choices: Before she can decide, she's attacked!
155234413314.content:
Amanda rolled back to the chief and called out with her telepathy.

"Thank you for giving them to me. Also, I've decided to take the gold as my last reward."
"Truly? I admit, I'm disappointed that you won't marry into my clan. But I respect your choice." After she says this, she pulls out a sack of gold from her belt and tosses it to Amanda.

"Thus, our business has ended. If you ever need a place to stay, feel free to visit my village. Farewell, little slime" she said. The guards gathered up the eggs in the nest and left with the chief to relocate the nest. Once again, Amanda was alone.

But that didn't bother her. She had made a friend, gained strength, and earned some gold. She rolled her viscous body over the sack and got to work digesting it. The metals were more difficult than organic matter to digest, and took more time to break down. It made Amanda feel a bit sick. But she stuck with it and absorbed all the gold coins.

<Amanda has reached level 24>
<Amanda has learned Skill: Golden Spray LV 1>
<Amanda has learned Skill: Gold Statue LV 1>
<Amanda has learned Passive Skill: Gold Drop LV 1>
<Amanda has learned Passive Skill: Gold Sensor LV 1>
<Extra evolution conditions have been met, new paths have opened>

Ooh, quite a bit came from eating the gold. Amanda decided to check her new status.

Amanda
Race: Training Slime
Occupation: None
Elements: None
LV: 24
Exp: 23901
Exp to next LV: 109
HP: 30
MP: 30
Atk: 4
Def: 1
MDf: 1
Agi: 3
Mag: 6
Int: 8
Luk: 2
Title: None

It hadn't changed much. The biggest downside to being a Beginner Slime is that the basic stats don't increase easily. But it did open many new doors. She checked the list of slimes she could still evolve into.

Firstly was the standard Slime, the basic evolution with no special traits. Next was the Lesser Heal Slime that she first unlocked. A new option was a Mana Slime. By gaining magical knowledge, these slimes are capable of launching many different spells.

Another evolution option was a Firm Slime. It was a slime that hardened its body to fight as its own weapon. It was a type that used only physical attacks. The next one sounded a bit unusual, an Aphrodisiac Slime. It specializes in making prey aroused and feeding on it while incapacitated.

Lastly, there was the Golden Slime. It was considered a rare evolution. Golden slimes had outstanding stats, and unique skills that manipulate precious metals. But, they can't evolve further.

Should Amanda evolve now, or keep looking for more possibilities?
155234413314.title: Take the gold

choices: on the outskirts of a town
15523441332.content:
Once she was at face level, the monster opened its mouth wide and shoved her inside! In an instant, she was surrounded by sharp fangs while laying on a slimy tongue. She tried to jump out, but the mouth clamped shut like a bear trap.

Her liquid body was swished around the mouth for a minute as the beast tasted her. It was an odd sensation for her. Feeling herself getting swished around and mixed with saliva...it was something she could never experience as a solid being.

After a minute, her prison slanted back as the lizardman swallowed.

GLUK!

Her body flowed down into its mighty throat, easily pulled along. She tried to scream, but without a mouth she made no noise. All she could do was feel herself get pulled down by the strong esophagus muscles.

Soon enough, she was fell with a splash into a pool of acids. Her body immediately began to mix with the fluid and dissolve. It wasn't even so much from digestion, she merely couldn't hold her form together when placed in other liquids. A good note for the future.

It took less than a minute for Amanda's health to completely drain. She was taken to a screen that read "YOU HAVE DIED" in large letters. There was a short timer for her to respawn, and Amanda watched it count down angrily.

"That does it. I'm going to exterminate all the lizardmen I find. Ungrateful bastards!" she said to herself. When the timer ended, Amanda clicked on the respawn button. When she opened her eyes, she found herself...
15523441332.title: Lizard Chow

15523444.content:
Here's some basic choices.

Snake: A basic snake that preys on smaller animals. Can evolve into dangerous beasts, or into a human like lamia.

Spider: Weak arachnids that frequently get preyed on. At higher levels, can produce venom and silk depending on evolution choices. Can evolve into larger beasts, or into the human like arachne.

Fish: Basic inhabitant of the water. After time, can evolve into a powerful sea monster. However, unable to go onto land.
15523444.title: Other

155234444.content:
Some higher class choices

Werewolf: Bipedal wolf monsters that are stronger during the full moon. They can evolve into stronger breeds, and at higher levels can temporarily transform into humans.

Unicorn: A mythical beast that protects nature. Can use many types of magic and have great speed. They can only evolve into higher versions of themselves.

Vampire: Human in appearance, but pale skinned with red eyes. Need to consume blood regularly or could become savage. Evolve into higher ranks of royalty.
155234444.title: Other

1553.content:
Angel: The heavenly race, sworn to defeat all evil. They appear human, except or a pair of white angel wings on their back. Blessed with the strongest holy attribute magic. They can evolve into higher ranked angels. But if they commit a single crime, they'll be changed into a Fallen Angel.

Fallen Angel: Look like angels, but their wings are black. Angels that gave in to sin are permanently expelled from heaven. Evolution is parallel to angels, but as darker versions. Main attacks are fire and darkness.
1553.title: Others

15533.content:
Half-Giant: A cross breed between a giant and another race. Half giants range from 10-30 ft tall. Their stats are similar to giants, but are able to level up faster.

Djinn: Magical beings that are bound to a magical item, and released by a master. Strongest magic users in the game, but have no free will while in captivity. Instead of evolving, they can change their element specialty.

Elemental: Beings made purely of elemental energy. They can deal the most damage in their element, but only in their element. They can evolve to higher purity beings.
15533.title: Other

155334.content:
Mini-Humes: A race identical to humans, except for one trait. They stand 3 inches tall. Cannot evolve, but can develop advanced jobs.

Icariin: A race that appears similar to angels. They look Native American, with tan skin and dark hair. A pair of wings grow from their back, but it depends on their species of bird. They naturally are unable to use Light element. They can evolve into stronger breeds.

Gnome: They appear similar to dwarves, but shorter. They stand around 1-2 feet tall. Living in elaborate burrows, these people build machines to help them fight.
155334.title: Other

info.description:
Based the story "Inside Adventurer" from my aryion account.

Amanda just purchased a new game that her friend recommended, but she soon finds that it's a bit too realistic.

Rules: I'll be pretty lax on these

Make good additions. It doesn't need to be perfect, just proper grammar and at least a paragraph (unless its a choice chapter)
If you make a character, include a proper status.
Amanda's character is always female
Players can't be dragons (if you're curious why, check out the actual story!)

(Temporary rule. If you want to create a new character, but don't know the lore, message me first.)
